text: innum um'mutaiya kaiyai umatu (marpupakkamaka) cattaip paiyil nulaiyappiraka!' Atu oli mikkatay macarra venmaiyaka velivarum. (Ivviru attatcikalum) hpir'avnukkum, avanutaiya camukattarukkum (nir kanpikka ventiya) onpatu attatcikalil ullavaiyakum; niccayamaka avarkal pavam ceyyum camukattaraka irukkinranar
